text: andulo spastamaina sanketalu unnayi. Ibrahim nilicina sthalam undi. Mariyu danilo pravesincinavadu abhayam (raksana) pondutadu. Mariyu akkadiki povataniki, saktigalavariki a grhayatra (hijjul bait) allah (prasannata) koraku ceyatam, vidhiga ceyabadindi. Evaru dinini tiraskaristaro! Varu niscayanga, allah samasta lokala vari avasaram leni svayam samrd'dhudu (ani telusukovali)
